name: GEMS202
title: Team Dynamics and Research Methodology
description: Prerequisite: GEMS100, GEMS102, and GEMS104. Corequisite: GEMS296. Restriction: Must be in the Gemstone program; and sophomore standing or higher. This experiential course is designed to foster an understanding of effective team dynamics and basic research methodology. It will teach skills applicable to Gemstone team research and the writing of a team thesis. Upperclass Gemstone students serve as discussion facilitators. Students participate in their Gemstone teams and develop a draft of their team thesis proposal.
